text: Helloo everyone:wave: I am using cms boilerplate theme in our project. I created 4 drag & drop column in one section and would like it to appear as 2 columns instead of 4 on mobile view. It's automatically showing one column. Is there a way to achieve this? Thank you in advance!
You could change the class names for the column containers to reflect what they need to look like at their respective screen widths/breakingpoints
